message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy.  This is a take it or leave it offer for this round.
Come on, Bob, you're losing value each round. This is a good compromise.
Alice, let's be realistic. This is my final offer.  Take it before inflation eats away at it even more.
Bob, your 'final offer' wasn't good enough. This is my new proposal. Inflation is on my side.
